## Example of an animated figure

Move to the next slide to see the transitions.

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyfragments.svg import animate

plt.ioff()

fig = plt.figure()
for i in range(10):
    plt.scatter(i, i, gid=".fragment")
animate(fig)
```

## Animated images

```{python}
import numpy as np
rng = np.random.default_rng(0)

plt.rc("image", composite_image=False)

fig = plt.figure()
for i in range(5):
    plt.imshow(rng.random((10, 10)), gid=".fragment")
animate(fig)
```
